testcase.name: Deleting a customer
testcase.system-out: Given User is on login page.................................................passed When User enters username...................................................passed And User enters password....................................................passed And User click on login button..............................................passed Then Dashboard page is displayed............................................passed When User clicks on tasks button............................................passed Then Tasks page is displayed................................................passed When User clicks on search field............................................passed And User enters customer name for search....................................passed And User clicks on edit button of that customer.............................passed And User clicks on action button............................................passed And User clicks on delete button............................................passed And User clicks on delete permanently button................................passed
